font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 拖延的： tending or intended to cause delay, characterized by procrastination
【例】 dilatory tactics['tæktɪk]战略
【例】 The homeowner is claiming that local firefighters were dilatory in responding to the call.
【近】 delaying, procrastinating, dragging, lagging落后的, tardy
【反】 rapid, fast, fleet, precipitate, rocketing, swift hasty, hurrying, scurrying 快速的
【记】 di双倍 + late 迟到，延迟二倍，拖拖拉拉
【另】 delay
